Sentencas: Quantitative effect and mechanism of Cr on cell performance inside stack are investigated by incorporating Cr in the cathode current-collecting layer (CCCL).
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that the maximum output power density (MOPD) of the unit cell inside a stack decreases as the Cr content increases beyond 253.81 mu g cm(-2).
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The MOPD is independent of Cr when its content is less than 253.81 mu g cm(-2) at the original operation stage.
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The degradation of the repeating unit inside the stack increases with increasing Cr content.
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: When the Cr content is higher than 182.22 mu g cm(-2), cell degradation increases.
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, cell degradation is independent of Cr content when its content is less than 182.22 mu g cm(-2).
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The addition of Cr to the CCCL increases the ohmic resistance of the CCCL and the contact between the cathode and the electrode during the initial stage.
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The effect of Cr on cell degradation increases with time, but Cr content has no influence on the contact resistance between the interconnect and the cathode.
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cell degradation is mainly dependent on ohmic resistance, and is independent of polarization resistance.
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, the addition of Cr to the CCCL increases the cell ohmic resistance, but does not affect cell polarization resistance.
Titulo: Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells
Effect and mechanism of Cr deposition in cathode current collecting layer on cell performance inside stack for planar solid oxide fuel cells
